item.title: Core and Glue
item.description: Photo by Oziel GÃ³mez on Unsplash. I aspire to be one of those people who leave this planet without a stone left unturned. No, I have no desire to live a painfully long life nor do I dream of immortality. What I really want is to reach the end, completely done, at ease with the fact that I reached my full potential. I think deep down that’s true for a lot of us; especially those of us who intentionally try to make our lives more productive.

item.title: Fulfilled
item.description: There comes a time in a one’s life when existential questions grow too loud to ignore. One that has been on my mind lately is fulfillment. It has been haunting me to the extent I thought online retailers were after me, throwing the word around like confetti; ‘Your order is fulfilled’, ‘[X] fulfillment center’, ‘fulfill this’, ‘fulfill that’. Sure, getting my package feels good but is it fulfilling? I don’t think so.
